member.name: T:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection
member.summary: Provides fucntionality for updating SQL database for Snake

member.name: F:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.ConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string. Your uID login name serves as both your database name and your uid

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.AddNewGame(System.String)
member.summary: This method adds a new GameID and StartTime to Games table in Database

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.AddNewPlayer(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new player to the Players table. Sets player Id, Player name, max score, startTime.

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.UpdatePlayerScore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This updates a players max score in the database

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.SetPlayerEndTime(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: When the player disconnecs from the game server, this method adds the leavetime to the clients row in Players, and the game row in Games tables in the database

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.SetGameEndTime(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the end time for a specific game on the webserver

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.GetGamesTable
member.summary: Gets a the game table
member.returns: A list of Games row objects to use for displaying games table in html

member.name: M:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.GetPlayersTable(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of playersRow object, which represent a row in the players database
member.returns: List of Players rows that correspond to the game ID

member.name: T:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.GamesRow
member.summary: Object representing a row in the Games table in SQL

member.name: T:GUI.Client.Controllers.DatabaseConnection.PlayersRow
member.summary: Object representing a row in the Players table in SQL

member.summary: Name of player, used on scoreboard

member.summary: bool to check if the world has received a player ID from the server

member.summary: bool to check if the world has received a world size from the server
